> "Gazoontite. Anyway, you can count on us Lord Elder. We promise, we'll wa=
tch our backs every step of the way."
>
> Quickstride shakes his head after=
 sneezing.
>
> " We won't do anything you wouldn't do, Sir. We'll have to m=
ove fast though, Lord Perseus probably needs us ASAP."
>
> Rat Trap opens t=
he hatch door while on Quickstride's back.
>
> "Wish us luck guys. We're go=
nna need it."

Elder nodded and smiled at Rat Trap and Quickstride. "I wish=
 you
success, may Primus help both of you." he said as he watched them
leav=
e. "May he watch over all of us." he said under his breath as he
turned bac=
k to Tuscon."

> " I think we should leave the shuttle where it is and head=
 toward the Ark on wheels. We can cover more ground that way. Plus, it's be=
en a while since I've done any form of off road driving and if we keep off =
the main roadways, no one will ever suspect that we've gone back to the Ark=
 instead of taking the bait."
>


Elder looked at the shuttle thoughtfully,=
 resting a hand on it. "Hmmm"
he said finally, "That might not be a bad ide=
a." He depressed a few
controls, trying to lock it down. Of course no lock =
is perfect.

He looked back at Tuscon, who had transformed into his vehicul=
ar mode already.

> He transforms into his SUV mode and opens his door to L=
ord Elder.
>
> "So who wants shotgun?"

With one last look back at the shut=
tle Elder slid into the proffered
door that Tuscon held open. "Let's go. We=
 have a lot of things ahead
of us."

OOC: Don't forget, this is millions of=
 years into Earth's past. Not
only are there no roads, but everything is co=
mpletely wild, and you
get to contend with things like Dinosaurs along the =
way! :)

Preston
